thread.title: WSJ Live Chat: How Might Trump Target the H-1B Skilled-Worker Visa Program?
thread.title_full: WSJ Live Chat: How Might Trump Target the H-1B Skilled-Worker Visa Program? - India Real Time - WSJ

author: Newley Purnell
title: WSJ Live Chat: How Might Trump Target the H-1B Skilled-Worker Visa Program?
text:
0 COMMENTS 
President Donald Trump has criticized the H-1B skilled-worker visa program as a source of “cheap labor,” and the White House is considering a draft executive order calling for it to be re-examined to protect U.S. workers’ jobs.
